songs.title: The Fire Next Time (Intro)
songs.lyrics:
[Intro: Billy Woods]
Crime became real for example. For the first time [?]. But as he profited. One would never defeat one's circumstances by working and saving up pennies. One would never by working acquire that many pennies. And besides, the social treatment proved that one needed in order to be free something more than a bag of [?].  One needed a handle, a lever, a mood to inspire fear
